titles.title: A resolution to constitute the majority party's membership on certain committees for the One Hundred Eleventh Congress, or until their successors are chosen.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration

bill.summary: 11/6/2009--Passed Senate without amendment. Makes majority party appointments to the Senate Committee on Rules and Administration for the 111th Congress.
